objectives: Identify and recall key vocabulary related to social media apps
Understand main ideas in conversations about social media apps
learning_style_adaptations: Use of diagrams, charts, and mind maps

multiple_intelligences.linguistic: Write a story or essay about social media apps
multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about social media apps
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of social media apps
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to social media apps
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about social media apps
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss social media apps
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to social media apps
multiple_intelligences.naturalistic: Categorize and classify concepts related to social media apps

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about social media apps
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about social media apps
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about social media apps

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Well-lit space with visual displays and projection capabilities

warm_up.description: Students examine images related to social media apps and discuss

main_activities.learning_style_adaptation: Use of diagrams, charts, and mind maps
main_activities.description: Students receive information about social media apps through visual modality
Students practice language related to social media apps using visual approach
Students produce original content about social media apps demonstrating basic thinking

discussion_prompts: Can you describe social media apps?
What do you know about social media apps?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for social media apps
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to social media apps

homework_options.required: Core assignment at basic level using visual approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

common_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge about social media apps
Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
